HP Prelude Backpack for 15.6" Laptop

The HP Prelude Backpack is compatible with laptops up to 15.6 inches in size. It is sleek, attractive, and durable. Put this cozy friend on your roller luggage and begin moving. Water-resistant and cushioned design protect your gadgets for a 13-inch, 14-inch, or 15-inch diagonal screen laptop and much more. This Ultralight Comfort Backpack, Slip on the cushioned straps of this lightweight, ultradurable attractive pack with a colorful zipper. Elegant meets stylish. Keep dry and move on by quickly strapping this little bag to your larger bag and keeping everything dry with water resistance. Everything is in its proper place. Tuck your laptop's 13.3-inch, 14.2-inch, or 15.6-inch diagonal screen into the pad-protected pocket, then put your phone, headphones, mouse, adaptor, and pens in their designated locations. The HP Prelude Backpack also features multiple pockets and compartments for storing accessories, books, and other essentials. The bag is made from high-quality materials and is designed to be durable and long-lasting. The backpack also has a comfortable, padded shoulder strap and back panel for easy carrying, ensuring your comfort even when the bag is fully loaded.
